function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Focus on healthcare facilities and educational buildings increases the risk of virus transmission in these high-traffic areas.","Impact":"Higher likelihood of virus transmission and potential outbreaks in these facilities.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols, improve ventilation systems, and enforce social distancing measures in these facilities.","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, UV disinfection technology, and contactless fixtures.","People":"Patients, students, healthcare workers, facility staff, and visitors.","Owner":"Facility management, healthcare authorities, and educational institutions."}]}
